content.content: Attention TUSD-A Users The TUSD-A vault type is being offboarded as a result of this Governance Poll and the surrounding context. As some of you already know, in January 2021 the Debt Ceiling for TUSD-A was set to 0 due to a token ownership change and a desire to manage risk exposure. Signal Request Executive Vote The next step will be the complete shutdown and liquidation of all remaining TUSD-A vaults via the method below.  Method TLDR; The facility will have its liquidations turned on, Liquidation Penalty set to 0, and Liquidation Ratio adjusted 150%. This will enable all these vaults to be liquidated.  Enable liquidations for TUSD-A Use Abacus/LinearDecrease  Set Liquidation Penalty to 0 Set Liquidation Ratio to 150% Set Auction Price Multiplier (buf) to 1 Set Local Liquidation Limit (ilk.hole) to 5 million DAI Set tau for Abacus/LinearDecrease to 21,600,000 second (estimated 10bps drop per 6 hours = 250 days till 0) Set Max Auction Duration (tail) to 432,000 seconds (5 days, implies minimum price of 0.98) Set Proportional Kick Incentive (chip) to 0 Set Flat Kick Incentive (tip) to 500  Learn More  Timeline The Executive Vote planned for Friday, April 1st, 2022 will enact the changes above.
Probably want to cross-post that r/makerDAO post to r/ethereum and r/ethfinance too
Already did r/MakerDAO. I wonder if doing so to r/ethereum and r/ethfinance would be considered spam? I’ll do it though, just to see if anyone gets bothered by it. edit: done!

Timeline Update:     Attention TUSD-A Users: Collateral Offboarding Timeline Update Notices       Due to a change in the TUSD token implementation, MakerDAO TUSD-A users were unable to make changes to their Vaults for the past few weeks. The recent Executive Vote from March 25th fixed that issue. Users now have full access to manage their vaults.  We are re-issuing the notice about offboarding the TUSD-A Vault type, with an updated timeline to give users two weeks to take any necessary actions.     Timeline The Executive Vote planned for Friday, April 8th, 2022 will enact the outlined change…
This topic was automatically closed 30 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

discourse_list.title: Attention TUSD-A Users: Collateral Offboarding Timeline Update

content.content: Due to a change in the TUSD token implementation, MakerDAO TUSD-A users were unable to make changes to their Vaults for the past few weeks. The recent Executive Vote from March 25th fixed that issue. Users now have full access to manage their vaults. We are re-issuing the notice about offboarding the TUSD-A Vault type, with an updated timeline to give users two weeks to take any necessary actions.     Attention TUSD-A Users: Collateral Offboarding Notices   Attention TUSD-A Users The TUSD-A vault type is being offboarded as a result of this Governance Poll and the surrounding context.  As some of you already know, in January 2021 the Debt Ceiling for TUSD-A was set to 0 due to a token ownership change and a desire to manage risk exposure.  Signal Request Executive Vote  The next step will be the complete shutdown and liquidation of all remaining TUSD-A vaults via the method below.   Method TLDR; The facility will have its liquidations turned on, …      Timeline The Executive Vote planned for Friday, April 15th, 2022 will enact the outlined changes.
This topic was automatically closed 30 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
